WorkItem.Description: Please consider allowing multiple instances of the Rawr application to execute at once.  It would be very useful to allow simultaneous comparisons of builds and gearing options.  It would also be useful for comparing different similar characters for raid staffing.

Comments.Message:
The comparison features are coming.

Regardless, you've been able to run multiple copies of Rawr for quite a while now; just only one per folder of data files. Duplicate the whole Rawr folder, and you'll be able to run a second copy.
